article_title: Memorial Day observance scheduled for the Estes Valley Memorial Gardens
article_text:
Print Email Font Resize Font Resize Memorial Day observance scheduled for the Estes Valley Memorial Gardens

Hundreds of American Flags dot the lawn around the Estes Park Town Hall in observance of Memorial Day. (John Cordsen) A Memorial Day observance is scheduled today at 11 a.m. at the Estes Valley Memorial Gardens. James and Hulda Bachman are the scheduled speakers.



Advertisement
